response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 by us, reflecting its high quality, unique features, and the dedication of our team behind it. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire it at a special introductory price of $10,000. This offer is designed to provide you with the best value while ensuring you have the chance to experience the superior quality firsthand. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can discuss how this product could enhance your needs or desires. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 10000}
